TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {5212=Saturday 15. August will be a great day at BAS. We welcome our new students and we celebrate our newly educated Masters in Architecture. Read more about the program., 4124=BAS er stolte av at tidligere student Guðrún Jóna Arinbjarnardóttir er vinner av Norske Arkitektstudenters Stålkonstruksjonspris 2015 med diplomprosjektet Through the Forest of columns. Hun mottar også European Student Awards for Architectural Design. Prispremien er kr 20.000 og en reise til Istanbul for å motta den europeiske prisen i september.}
textBeforeTable: Juli 2013 neste forrige Kalender Diploma 2014: "SELF CITY NATION" by Shreya Nagrath: Exploring the mutually reciprocal relationship between a human being and a city Diploma 2014: "Battle Grounds" by Robert Moe: Reclaiming a community from a failed attempt at urban renewal Diploma 2014: "Transformative landscapes" by Kim Kendel: - an intervention in the historic city centre of BergenThe historic area ‘Vågsbunnen’ in the inner city of Bergen has increasingly gained attention from developers as well as cultural Diploma 2014: "INVERTED BEAUTY" by Ann-Sofie Indgul and Aina Telhaug: a hidden diploma Diploma 2014: "La Wergeland Leve" by Viktor Svantesson: Let Wergeland live Diploma 2014: "EX LIBRIS" by Katrine Wang Høiem: Proposal for a New Public Library in the City Center of Grimstad
